rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with traditional Kerala motifs and ample natural light from a window.
An open-plan living area integrated with the kitchen. Features floor-to-ceiling windows for abundant daylight and Vastu alignment.
Modern, functional kitchen with traditional Kerala finishes, designed to be part of the open-plan living area.
Master bedroom with privacy and Vastu-optimized south-east direction placement. Includes an ensuite bathroom.
Additional bedroom designed for family members, maintaining alignment with Vastu principles.
Third bedroom, ensuring a balanced layout in the Kerala-style design. Includes access to a small utility area.
General bathroom designed for common use, adhering to local building norms and Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Access door to the swimming pool area.

additional_features.description: Traditional Kerala-style swimming pool with integrated landscaping, placed in the backyard aligning with Vastu principles.
A traditional verandah serving as a transitional space between indoors and outdoors.

vastu_alignment.description: The layout adheres to Vastu principles ensuring optimal energy flow and harmony with natural elements.
